mapper.select: select count(*) from employee where emp_id = #{emp_id}

select e.emp_id, e.emp_name, d.quiz_cfg_code_name as d_quiz_cfg_code_name, e.emp_tel, g.quiz_cfg_code_name as g_quiz_cfg_code_name from employee e, quiz_config d, quiz_config g where emp_id = #{emp_id} and (e.emp_dept = d.quiz_cfg_code and e.emp_grade = g.quiz_cfg_code)
select quiz_cfg_code, quiz_cfg_code_name from quiz_config where quiz_cfg_code_group = 'dept'
select quiz_cfg_code, quiz_cfg_code_name from quiz_config where quiz_cfg_code_group = 'grade'
mapper.update: update employee set emp_name = #{emp_name}, emp_dept = #{emp_dept}, emp_tel = #{emp_tel}, emp_grade = #{emp_grade}, where emp_id = #{emp_id}
